00018 #include <votca/tools/akimaspline.h>
00019 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/matrix.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/vector.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/vector_proxy.hpp>
00022 #include <votca/tools/linalg.h>
00023 #include <gsl/gsl_linalg.h>

00028 using namespace std;
00029 
00030 void AkimaSpline::Interpolate(ub::vector<double> &x, ub::vector<double> &y)
00031 {    
00032     if(x.size() != y.size())
00033         throw std::invalid_argument("error in AkimaSpline::Interpolate : sizes of vectors x and y do not match");
00034     
00035     // Akima splines require at least 4 points
00036     if(x.size()<4)
00037         throw std::invalid_argument("error in AkimaSpline::Interpolate : vectors x and y have to contain at least 4 points");
00038 
00039     const int N = x.size();
00040     
00041     // adjust the grid
00042     _r.resize(N);
00043     
00044     // copy the grid points into f
00045     _r = x;
00046     
00047     // initialize vectors p1,p2,p3,p4 and t
00048     p0 = ub::zero_vector<double>(N);
00049     p1 = ub::zero_vector<double>(N);
00050     p2 = ub::zero_vector<double>(N);
00051     p3 = ub::zero_vector<double>(N);
00052     t = ub::zero_vector<double>(N);
00053 
00054     double m1,m2,m3,m4;
00055 
00056     double temp, g0, g1, g2, x1, x2, y1, y2, x4, x5, y4, y5, m5;
00057     
00058     // boundary conditions
00059     // >> determine t(0), t(1) and t(N-2), t(N-1)
00060     switch(_boundaries) {
00061         case splineNormal:
00062             // Akima method: estimation of two more points on each side using a
00063             // degree two polyomial
00064             // resulting slopes t(0), t(1), t(N-2), t(N-1) are directly calculated
00065 
00066             // left side: t(0), t(1)
00067             temp = (x(1)-x(0))/(x(2)-x(0));
00068             temp = temp*temp;
00069             g0 = y(0);
00070             g1 = ( (y(1)-y(0)) - temp*(y(2)-y(0)) ) / ( (x(1)-x(0)) - temp*(x(2)-x(0)) );
00071             g2 = ( (y(2)-y(0)) - g1*(x(2)-x(0)) ) / ( (x(2)-x(0))*(x(2)-x(0)) );
00072             x1 = x(0) - (x(2)-x(0));
00073             x2 = x(1) - (x(2)-x(0));
00074             y1 = g0 + g1*(x1-x(0)) + g2*(x1-x(0))*(x1-x(0));
00075             y2 = g0 + g1*(x2-x(0)) + g2*(x2-x(0))*(x2-x(0));
00076             m1 = (y2-y1)/(x2-x1);
00077             m2 = (y(0)-y2)/(x(0)-x2);
00078             m3 = (y(1)-y(0))/(x(1)-x(0));
00079             m4 = (y(2)-y(1))/(x(2)-x(1));
00080             t(0) = getSlope(m1,m2,m3,m4);
00081             m5 = (y(3)-y(2))/(x(3)-x(2));
00082             t(1) = getSlope(m2,m3,m4,m5);
00083 
00084             // right side: t(N-2), t(N-1)
00085             temp = (x(N-2)-x(N-1))/(x(N-3)-x(N-1));
00086             temp = temp*temp;
00087             g0 = y(N-1);
00088             g1 = ( (y(N-2)-y(N-1)) - temp*(y(N-3)-y(N-1)) ) / ( (x(N-2)-x(N-1)) - temp*(x(N-3)-x(N-1)) );
00089             g2 = ( (y(N-3)-y(N-1)) - g1*(x(N-3)-x(N-1)) ) / ( (x(N-3)-x(N-1))*(x(N-3)-x(N-1)) );
00090             x4 = x(N-2) + (x(N-1)-x(N-3));
00091             x5 = x(N-1) + (x(N-1)-x(N-3));
00092             y4 = g0 + g1*(x4-x(N-1)) + g2*(x4-x(N-1))*(x4-x(N-1));
00093             y5 = g0 + g1*(x5-x(N-1)) + g2*(x5-x(N-1))*(x5-x(N-1));
00094             m1 = (y(N-3)-y(N-4))/(x(N-3)-x(N-4));
00095             m2 = (y(N-2)-y(N-3))/(x(N-2)-x(N-3));
00096             m3 = (y(N-1)-y(N-2))/(x(N-1)-x(N-2));
00097             m4 = (y4-y(N-1))/(x4-x(N-1));
00098             m5 = (y5-y4)/(x5-x4);
00099             t(N-2) = getSlope(m1,m2,m3,m4);
00100             t(N-1) = getSlope(m2,m3,m4,m5);
00101             break;
00102         case splinePeriodic:
00103             // left: last two points determine the slopes t(0), t(1)
00104             m1 = (y(N-1)-y(N-2))/(x(N-1)-x(N-2));
00105             m2 = (y(0)-y(N-1))/(x(0)-x(N-1));
00106             m3 = (y(1)-y(0))/(x(1)-x(0));
00107             m4 = (y(2)-y(1))/(x(2)-x(1));
00108             m5 = (y(3)-y(2))/(x(3)-x(2));
00109             t(0) = getSlope(m1,m2,m3,m4);
00110             t(1) = getSlope(m2,m3,m4,m5);
00111             // right: first two points determine the slopes t(N-2), t(N-1)
00112             m1 = (y(N-3)-y(N-4))/(x(N-3)-x(N-4));
00113             m2 = (y(N-2)-y(N-3))/(x(N-2)-x(N-3));
00114             m3 = (y(N-1)-y(N-2))/(x(N-1)-x(N-2));
00115             m4 = (y(0)-y(N-1))/(x(0)-x(N-1));
00116             m5 = (y(1)-y(0))/(x(1)-x(0));
00117             t(N-2) = getSlope(m1,m2,m3,m4);
00118             t(N-1) = getSlope(m2,m3,m4,m5);
00119             break;
00120         case splineDerivativeZero:
00121             throw std::runtime_error("erro in AkimaSpline::Interpolate: case splineDerivativeZero not implemented yet");
00122             break;
00123     }
00124     
00125     // calculate t's for all inner points [2,N-3]
00126     for (int i=2; i<N-2; i++) {
00127         m1 = (y(i-1)-y(i-2))/(x(i-1)-x(i-2));
00128         m2 = (y(i)-y(i-1))/(x(i)-x(i-1));
00129         m3 = (y(i+1)-y(i))/(x(i+1)-x(i));
00130         m4 = (y(i+2)-y(i+1))/(x(i+2)-x(i+1));
00131         t(i) = getSlope(m1,m2,m3,m4);
00132     }
00133 
00134     // calculate p0,p1,p2,p3 for all intervals 0..(N-2), where interval
00135     // [x(i),x(i+1)] shall have number i (this means that the last interval
00136     // has number N-2)
00137     for (int i=0; i<N-1; i++) {
00138         p0(i) = y(i);
00139         p1(i) = t(i);
00140         p2(i) = ( 3.0*(y(i+1)-y(i))/(x(i+1)-x(i)) - 2.0*t(i) - t(i+1) ) / (x(i+1)-x(i));
00141         p3(i) = ( t(i) + t(i+1) - 2.0*(y(i+1)-y(i))/(x(i+1)-x(i)) ) / ( (x(i+1)-x(i))*(x(i+1)-x(i)) );
00142     }
00143 }
00144 
00145 void AkimaSpline::Fit(ub::vector<double> &x, ub::vector<double> &y)
00146 {
00147     throw std::runtime_error("Akima fit not implemented.");
00148 }
